

.. _bitmap-font:

============
Bitmap Fonts
============

Bitmap fonts are useful when you want a very specific text style, specially in Pixel Art games.

.. image:: ./images/bitmap_font.png

.. _bitmap-font-creation:

Creating a Bitmap Font
======================

To create a Bitmap Font, click on the Import Button |import_button| in the :ref:`Assets View <assets-view>`.

Then select a BMP and a CSV file exported from `Codehead's Bitmap Font Generator <http://www.codehead.co.uk/cbfg/>`_ tool.

Using a Bitmap Font
===================

1. Select your **Text** entity in the Scene
2. Make sure the **Font** is set to **Bitmap Font**
3. Set the **Texture** and **Metrics** properties to the BMP and CSV assets imported during :ref:`Bitmap Font Creation <bitmap-font-creation>`.

.. |import_button| image:: ../images/import_button.png
